original_title: ตรงกลางระหว่างรัก​
overview: As Per travels to Focus and Ball's wedding in the countryside, Per remembers their time in high school. Per was a new transfer student who was immediately attracted to Ball. Although Ball seemed to have a liking for Per, Focus and Ball had already established a solid friendship and Focus was in love with Ball. Will the wedding go through or will Ball choose Per in the end?
title: I Love You
